00054 class ServiceException : public SimpleException
00055 {
00056  public:
00060   ServiceException(const SimpleString m, int Err = UnkownSimpleExceptionCode );
00061

00066

00071   virtual SimpleString GetExceptionType() const;

00073 
00080 class CommonServiceValues
00081 {
00082 public:
00089         enum TransportProtocol{
00090             UNKNOWN = 0,                
00091             TCP = Socket::UDP,  
00092             UDP = Socket::TCP   
00093         };
00094 
00101         enum SizeOfBuffers {
00102             ServiceField = 64,  
00103             ProtocolAndTransportField = ServiceField + sizeof("_tcp"), 
00104             ServiceNameLength = (3*ServiceField + sizeof("_tcp") + OmiscidServiceMaxDomainName + 4), 
00105             RegtypeLength = ServiceField + sizeof("_tcp")
00106         };
00107 
00108 
00109     static const SimpleString NameForLockString;                // = "lock"
00110     static const SimpleString NameForNameString;                // = "name"
00111     static const SimpleString NameForOwnerString;               // = "owner"
00112     static const SimpleString NameForClassString;               // = "class"
00113     static const SimpleString NameForPeerIdString;              // = "peerId"
00114 
00115     static const SimpleString GetOmiscidServiceDnsSdType();
00116     static const SimpleString DefaultServiceClassName;          // = "Service"
00117 
00118 private:
00119     // In order to propose InitFunction to the LayerManager
00120     friend class OmiscidServiceControlLayerInitClass;
00121     void InitFromLayer();
00122 };
00123 
00124 } // namespace Omiscid
